name: SenyaTalk
commands: Which topic do you want to ask about?
There's nothing good to say about him.|He abandoned his duties.
Was death the best way for him to repent?|He was fighting for Greshia, wasn't he?
Even so, he was dead weight.|Did you see the amount of monsters there were?
.....|I can never forgive him for what he did.
Yes, when my caravan got attacked.|We initially thought we were saved, but who knew!|They ran with their tails tucked in between their legs when the fight got tough.|I only lived due to sheer luck.
Senya...I'm sorry for bringing this up.
...you and Schuri go deal with him.|Make sure he gets punished.|I don't want to ever see his face again.
Good riddance I say.|A person such as him has no place with such a high position.
If you don't mind me asking...why do you hate him?|I mean I do have an inkling but...

And your inkling would be correct.|When my caravan got attacked, we thought we were saved.|But who knew! They ran with their tails tucked in between their legs.|They ran when the fight got tough.|The only reason I'm alive was due to sheer luck.
Yes, I can't imagine how many others experienced the same thing.|He was a high guard.|I can't imagine how many missions he's been dispatched on.
I know Schuri has different thoughts on this matter but...|I believe she'll see my reasoning.
Aesc...he's Teacher's teacher. Does that make him our grandteacher?|There's still a lot we don't know and it feels like he has the answers to them all.
We'll eventually figure it out.|Hopefully he's receptive to our questions.|I remember how cagey Teach would get whenever I asked him about his life.
I suppose so...|There's too many things we don't understand.
Has Greshia changed much from before?
Greshia has changed. It used to be...more alive.|{var:MC_name}, there's fear.|The people are afraid.|I don't know what's up with the lord but...if there isn't a leader soon...|There will be conflict.
source:
add_portrait;Senya;Right
speak;Senya;What's up?
choice;SenyaConversation3;Which topic do you want to ask about?;Head Guard,Aesc,Greshia;FLAG(backable);horizontal;top_left
if;game.game_vars['SenyaConversation3'] == 'Head Guard'
    add_portrait;MC;Left
    speak;MC;About that guard...
    if;game.game_vars['_ch2GuardSaved'] == True
        speak;Senya;There's nothing good to say about him.|He abandoned his duties.
        speak;MC;Was death the best way for him to repent?|He was fighting for Greshia, wasn't he?
        speak;Senya;Even so, he was dead weight.|Did you see the amount of monsters there were?
        expression;Senya;HalfCloseEyes
        speak;Senya;.....|I can never forgive him for what he did.
        expression;Senya;NoSmile
        speak;Senya;Back then...he also ran.
        speak;MC;Ran?
        speak;Senya;Yes, when my caravan got attacked.|We initially thought we were saved, but who knew!|They ran with their tails tucked in between their legs when the fight got tough.|I only lived due to sheer luck.
        speak;MC;Senya...I'm sorry for bringing this up.
        expression;Senya;CloseEyes
        speak;Senya;...you and Schuri go deal with him.|Make sure he gets punished.|I don't want to ever see his face again.
        expression;Senya;OpenEyes
    else
        speak;Senya;Good riddance I say.|A person such as him has no place with such a high position.
        speak;MC;If you don't mind me asking...why do you hate him?|I mean I do have an inkling but...
        speak;Senya;And your inkling would be correct.|When my caravan got attacked, we thought we were saved.|But who knew! They ran with their tails tucked in between their legs.|They ran when the fight got tough.|The only reason I'm alive was due to sheer luck.
        speak;MC;Yes, I can't imagine how many others experienced the same thing.|He was a high guard.|I can't imagine how many missions he's been dispatched on.
        speak;Senya;I know Schuri has different thoughts on this matter but...|I believe she'll see my reasoning.
    end
elif;game.game_vars['SenyaConversation3'] == 'Aesc'
    add_portrait;MC;Left
    speak;Senya;Aesc...he's Teacher's teacher. Does that make him our grandteacher?|There's still a lot we don't know and it feels like he has the answers to them all.
    speak;MC;We'll eventually figure it out.|Hopefully he's receptive to our questions.|I remember how cagey Teach would get whenever I asked him about his life.
    speak;Senya;I suppose so...|There's too many things we don't understand.
    ##################

    add_portrait;MC;Left
    speak;MC;Has Greshia changed much from before?
    speak;Senya;Greshia has changed. It used to be...more alive.|{var:MC_name}, there's fear.|The people are afraid.|I don't know what's up with the lord but...if there isn't a leader soon...|There will be conflict.
